login.title: Log in

termsAgreement.part1: By clicking "Sign up" above, you confirm that you have read, understood and accepted the

username.exists: Account with this username already exists.

errors.register: Error trying to register, try again later!

username.shareInfo: This information will be shared publicly. So be careful with what you share.
username.checkInbox: Check your inbox and follow the instructions sent in the email to complete the change.
username.planChangeInstructions: To change your plan, contact us:
username.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
username.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers.
username.trialPeriod: You will have a 7-day free trial before being charged.
username.couponEffect: From the {{couponDuration}}th {{planInterval}}{{trialDay}}, you will be charged {{totalAmount}}/{{planInterval2}}.
username.paymentSuccessful: Your payment was processed successfully. You will receive an email with your purchase details.
username.paymentError: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again or contact support:
username.integratedDataTooltip: Our data standardization and compatibility methodology allows you to cross-reference tables from different institutions and themes in a simplified manner.
username.sqlPythonRAccess: Access via SQL, Python, and R
username.downloadLimitTooltip: This limit does not apply to access via SQL, Python, and R.
username.companyReferenceTable: Company reference table with updated information
username.downloadLimitProTooltip: Tables larger than 1 GB are not available for partial or complete download. This limit does not apply to access via SQL, Python, and R.
username.useNewPassword: Use your new password to log in next time.
username.prioritySupport: Priority support via email and Discord
username.checkInboxAndFollowInstructions: Check your inbox and follow the instructions sent in the email to complete the change.
username.dataStorageInfo: Learn how your data is stored in our Terms of Use and Privacy Policies. To export your account data, contact us.
username.exportDataInstructions: To export your data, contact us:
username.accountAccessWarning: By deleting your account, you will lose access to all your data and information.

activate.congratulations: Congratulations! Your account has been successfully activated. You are now part of our community.
activate.thankYou: Thank you for joining us. We're here to help you out whenever you need it.
activate.activationProblem: We regret to inform you that there was a problem during account activation. We apologize for the inconvenience.

passwordRecovery.passwordMismatch: The password entered does not match the password created in the field above. Please check for typing errors and try again.
